responses
200
v1GetLocationsResponse
type object
properties
paginationPageInfo
type object
properties
totalCount
type string
description The total number of items in the dataset
hasPreviousPage
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasNextPage
type boolean
format boolean

startCursor
type string
description The cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endCursor
type string
description The cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
description Information about a paginated response

This is modeled after the GraphQL Relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type array
workloadv1Location
type object
properties
name
type string
description A human readable location name
city
type string
description A locations city
cityCode
type string
description A locations city expressed as an IATA airport code
subdivision
type string
description A locations subdivision
subdivisionCode
type string
description A locations subdivision code
country
type string
description A locations country
countryCode
type string
description A locations ISO31661 alpha2 country code
region
type string
description A locations state or province
regionCode
type string
description A locations ISO31662 region code
continent
type string
description A locations continent
continentCode
type string
description A locations continent code
latitude
type number
format double
description A locations geographic latitude
longitude
type number
format double
description A locations geographic longitude
description Geographic location information
description The requested locations
description A response from a request to retrieve the locations a workload may be created at
